name: Happily Ever After (itch) (Matt Rayne)
description:
Many suitors wait outside the Princess’ window.
One of them is her authentic Prince Charming.
One of them is the Princess in disguise!

RPG for 3 or more players about classic fairy tale princesses.
Exactly 200 words rulebook. Only pen and paper needed.
It's untested, but I hope you have fun!

Made for the 200 words challenge 2019.
https://200wordrpg.github.io/2019/rpg/2019/10/12/HappilyEverAfter.html
